description.en:
SpritzCoin Project is not only a cryptocurrency but an ecosystem in the beverage Industry based on the Ethereum ERC20 blockchain.

Our GOAL is to become the the largest bar in the world without owning any bar.

A dApp to search, book, pay and get free cashback, discover places and events thanks to virtual reality, it will also be your best JOB finder solution …
SpritzCoin is a platform to DISCOVER coffee or tea houses, bars and pubs, events and parties, the best nightclubs in the city and amazing beverage companies …

We’ re reinventing the global beverage marketplace, secure, smart and easy- to-use.
Completely disrupting the way in which the consumer earns a bonus, the merchant pays a commission and the users buy and sell products online.
Founders
